title: Q time is OP
body:
"Write your thoughts"... 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} er nothing other than the Q time is to long look at this! MY Q TIME IS CURRENTLY OVER 40 MINS!  

wasting my life here on OCE, no show getting any RP outta me RITO...   get good!

replies.body: What time(s) of the day/night are you queuing up though?

When it comes to queue times I highly recommend deciding on the exact amount of time you are willing to wait. I personally find that somewhere between 5-8 minutes is best, a point at which I either change queue type (Ranked to ARAM) or simply go and do something else. Now that I think about it, the more specific the time I choose is (eg 5:32) the more hype the countdown itself becomes.
on this account normals  is around 1:30  ranked is about 2:00 however on my level 10 account that im trying to get to 30 normals que times are around 7:00
It pays to suck sometimes. My queue times are also quite short.
lol rank or normal my normal are 32sec-4min
